content:
When an asteroid hits Earth, the amount of damage it causes depends primarily on the asteroid’s kinetic energy, which is given by the equation:

KE = ½ mv 2

In this equation KE is the kinetic energy of the asteroid, m is the mass of the asteroid, and v is its velocity. Note that the velocity is squared in the equation.

The table lists the masses and velocities of three asteroids.

question.title: Question #1
question.label: Predict which of the asteroids in the table above would cause damage over the largest area if it hit Earth? Which would damage the smallest area? Explain your reasoning.
